content:
Any thoughts on the "description" text that is applied to all resources when displayed in tables using the value in the IG if provided rather than one generated from the resource?

        <resource>
            <reference>
                <reference value="Consent/cons-approved" />
            </reference>
            <description value="Patient approved the Practitioner's access to their record"/>
            <exampleBoolean value="true" />
        </resource>
From the implementationguide.xml where the example is included in the guide.
